definition: to hinder/(in the negative or interrogative) (no) harm/(what) harm

sentences.english: However, this does not prevent us from the start of their feelings of confidence.
sentences.chinese: 可是，这并不妨碍我们对彼此感情地久天长的信心。

sentences.english: He lived for the day, not cumbered and mortified by his memory.
sentences.chinese: 他生活在现在，从没受过自己的回忆的羞辱和妨碍。

sentences.english: The report said the pipeline agency was hampered by a chronic inspector shortage.
sentences.chinese: 报告说，长期缺乏检查员妨碍了管道安全局开展工作。

sentences.english: A steady rain hampered the progress of the work.
sentences.chinese: 持续不停的大雨妨碍了工程的进展。

sentences.english: Such bottlenecks have been hampering the opening of new mines and the expansion of existing ones.
sentences.chinese: 这些瓶颈已经妨碍新矿的开发和已有矿产的扩大。

sentences.english: An excess of zinc, for example, can interfere with absorption of other nutrients, including iron and copper.
sentences.chinese: 比如，过量的锌会妨碍铁和铜等其他营养成分吸收。

sentences.english: If the truck parks there, it will block the driveway.
sentences.chinese: 如果把卡车听在这儿，会妨碍交通的。

sentences.english: She never had children because they would have interfered with her dancing career.
sentences.chinese: 她一直没生孩子，因为孩子会妨碍她的舞蹈生涯。

sentences.english: "Servility" is obstruct the exercise of the right to freedom of the root.
sentences.chinese: “奴性性”是妨碍自由权利行使的根源。

sentences.english: Some romance and implied sexuality never hurt.
sentences.chinese: 要保证浪漫和性暗示不受到妨碍。

sentences.english: Microcosmic space is the hollow ball that has limit, it is not the ball of Poincare conjecture.
sentences.chinese: 选择大型篮或妨碍为此，一个有很多空洞空间。

sentences.english: Such doubts have not stopped China claiming mastery over the clouds.
sentences.chinese: 这种怀疑并没有妨碍中国宣称已把云朵握在手中。

sentences.english: I hope I am not intruding.
The independent director system wouldn't take effect unless these barriers were removed. The establishment of independent director system has …
sentences.chinese: 这些障碍妨碍了独立董事制度的建立和作用的发挥。

sentences.english: I guss i'll just get of your way.
sentences.chinese: 我想我还是不妨碍你的事了。

sentences.english: This prevents fast Ethernet from being a good backbone technology choice.
sentences.chinese: 这就妨碍了快速以太网成为一种好的主干网选择。

definition: to be limited to/to be confined to
in fact/in reality/actually/as a matter of fact/de facto/ipso facto
